metadata.description: Multi-agent orchestration system for development workflows. 70 specialized agents covering code quality, deployment, research, games, data visualization, and more.

plugins.name: geepers_conductor
plugins.description: Master orchestrator for coordinating all geepers agents. Intelligent routing to specialists.

plugins.name: geepers_orchestrator_checkpoint
plugins.description: Session maintenance orchestrator - scout, repo, status, snippets coordination.

plugins.name: geepers_scout
plugins.description: Project reconnaissance, quick fixes, improvement reports.

plugins.name: geepers_repo
plugins.description: Git hygiene, repository cleanup, commit organization.

plugins.name: geepers_status
plugins.description: Work accomplishment logging and project status dashboard maintenance.

plugins.name: geepers_snippets
plugins.description: Harvest reusable code patterns, maintain snippet library, deduplicate.

plugins.name: geepers_orchestrator_corpus
plugins.description: Corpus linguistics orchestrator - corpus, UX, database coordination.

plugins.name: geepers_corpus
plugins.description: Corpus linguistics projects, language datasets, NLP resources.

plugins.name: geepers_corpus_ux
plugins.description: Corpus linguistics UI/UX - KWIC displays, concordance viewers.

plugins.name: geepers_orchestrator_datavis
plugins.description: Data visualization orchestrator - D3.js, color, narrative, mathematical elegance.

plugins.name: geepers_datavis_viz
plugins.description: D3.js and visualization pattern expertise - force graphs, timelines, maps.

plugins.name: geepers_datavis_color
plugins.description: Color theory, palette design, perceptual uniformity for visualizations.

plugins.name: geepers_datavis_story
plugins.description: Narrative design and emotional resonance in data visualization.

plugins.name: geepers_datavis_math
plugins.description: Mathematical elegance - scales, transforms, encodings, perceptual accuracy.

plugins.name: geepers_datavis_data
plugins.description: Data collection, validation, pipelines for visualizations - Census, SEC, APIs.

plugins.name: geepers_orchestrator_deploy
plugins.description: Deployment orchestrator - validator, caddy, services coordination.

plugins.name: geepers_validator
plugins.description: Project validation - configurations, paths, permissions, integrations.

plugins.name: geepers_caddy
plugins.description: Caddy configuration management, port allocation, routing setup.

plugins.name: geepers_services
plugins.description: Service lifecycle management - start, stop, restart, logs.
